member.name: T:PropertyHook.Kernel32
member.summary: Provides wrappers for process manipulation via kernel32.dll.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHEventArgs
member.summary: Args passed to the hook and unhook events of a PHook.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHEventArgs.Hook
member.summary: The PHook that hooked or unhooked.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHEventArgs.#ctor(PropertyHook.PHook)
member.summary: Create a new PHEventArgs with the given hook.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHPointer
member.summary: A dynamic pointer starting from an AOB, fixed address, or other pointer. Provides functions for reading and writing memory.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHPointer.Hook
member.summary: The parent PHook whose handle is used for remote operations.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHPointer.Offsets
member.summary: After finding the base address, for each offset in this array the pointer will advance by the offset, read another address, and follow it.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.#ctor(PropertyHook.PHook,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new PHPointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.Resolve
member.summary: Evaluates the base address and follows each offset to find the final address.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ResolveSpecific
member.summary: Evaluates the pointer's base address.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadBytes(System.Int32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Read length number of bytes from the given offset.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteBytes(System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Write length number of bytes at the given offset.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadIntPtr(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read an address from the given offset.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadFlag32(System.Int32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Read a 4-byte bitfield and return whether the bit specified by the given mask is set.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteFlag32(System.Int32,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set the state of a bit specified by the given mask in a 4-byte bitfield.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadSByte(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 1-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteSByte(System.Int32,System.SByte)
member.summary: Write a 1-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadByte(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 1-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteByte(System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Write a 1-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadBoolean(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 1-byte boolean value.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteBoolean(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Write a 1-byte boolean value.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadInt16(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 2-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteInt16(System.Int32,System.Int16)
member.summary: Write a 2-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadUInt16(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 2-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteUInt16(System.Int32,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Write a 2-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadInt32(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 4-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteInt32(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write a 4-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadUInt32(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 4-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteUInt32(System.Int32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Write a 4-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadInt64(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read an 8-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteInt64(System.Int32,System.Int64)
member.summary: Write an 8-byte signed integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadUInt64(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read an 8-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteUInt64(System.Int32,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Write an 8-byte unsigned integer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadSingle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a 4-byte floating point number.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteSingle(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Write a 4-byte floating point number.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadDouble(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read an 8-byte floating point number.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteDouble(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Write an 8-byte floating point number.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.ReadString(System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reads and decodes a fixed amount of bytes as a string. If trim is set, terminates after the first null character.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointer.WriteString(System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Encodes and writes a string as a fixed amount of bytes. If the string is too long to fit, it is truncated before encoding.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHook
member.summary: An interface to another application's memory that automatically handles hooking, unhooking, and pointer management.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHook.Hooked
member.summary: Whether the hook is currently attached to a process.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHook.Process
member.summary: The currently attached process, or null if none.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHook.Is64Bit
member.summary: Whether the attached process is 32-bit or 64-bit.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHook.Handle
member.summary: The handle to the attached process, or zero if none.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHook.RefreshInterval
member.summary: How often the automatic hooking thread should check for new processes, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHook.MinLifetime
member.summary: The minimum time a process must have been running before hooking is attempted, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHook.AOBScanSucceeded
member.summary: Indicates whether all AOB scans found a match during the last scan. Always false when unhooked.

member.name: E:PropertyHook.PHook.OnHooked
member.summary: Fires immediately after attaching to a new process.

member.name: E:PropertyHook.PHook.OnUnhooked
member.summary: Fires immediately after detaching from a process.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.GetPointers
member.summary: Starts a thread that automatically checks for new processes to hook.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Func{System.Diagnostics.Process,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Creates a new PHook.
member.param: How often the automatic hooking thread should check for new processes, in milliseconds.
The minimum time a process must have been running before hooking is attempted, in milliseconds.
A function that determines if a process should be attempted to be hooked.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.Start
member.summary: Starts a thread that automatically checks for new processes to hook.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.Stop
member.summary: Stops the automatic hooking thread.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.Refresh
member.summary: Checks for new processes to attach to; either call this manually, or call Start to do it automatically.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.RegisterRelativeAOB(System.Nullable{System.Byte}[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates and registers a new relative AOB pointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.RegisterRelativeAOB(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Create and register a new relative AOB pointer with a CE-style AOB string.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.RegisterAbsoluteAOB(System.Nullable{System.Byte}[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates and registers a new absolute AOB pointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.RegisterAbsoluteAOB(System.String,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates and registers a new absolute AOB pointer with a CE-style AOB string.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.CreateBasePointer(System.IntPtr,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new base address pointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.CreateChildPointer(PropertyHook.PHPointer,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new child pointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.UnregisterAOBPointer(PropertyHook.PHPointerAOB)
member.summary: Unregisters an AOB pointer. Returns null.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.RescanAOB
member.summary: Manually rescans all AOB pointers.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.Allocate(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Allocates a memory region with the given size and permissions.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.GetPrefferedIntPtr(System.Int32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Get's a pointer allocated in near the process image.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.Free(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Frees a memory region at the given address. Returns true if successful.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.Execute(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Starts a thread at the given address and waits for it to complete. Returns execution result.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.Execute(System.Byte[],System.UInt32)
member.summary: Allocates memory for the given bytes, starts a thread at their address, waits for it to complete, and frees the memory. Returns execution result.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHook.InjectDLL(System.String)
member.summary: Injects DLL specified in path.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOB
member.summary: A dynamic pointer starting from an array of bytes scanned for in the target process.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOB.AOB
member.summary: The AOB to scan for.

member.name: F:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOB.AOBResult
member.summary: The result of the AOB scan.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOB.#ctor(PropertyHook.PHook,System.Nullable{System.Byte}[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new AOB pointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOB.ResolveSpecific
member.summary: Returns the result of the AOB scan.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOBAbsolute
member.summary: A dynamic pointer starting from the base address of an array of bytes scanned for in the target process.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOBAbsolute.#ctor(PropertyHook.PHook,System.Nullable{System.Byte}[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new absolute AOB pointer.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOBRelative
member.summary: A dynamic pointer starting from a relative address found after an array of bytes scanned for in the target process.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOBRelative.AddressOffset
member.summary: The offset of the relative address from the beginning of the AOB.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOBRelative.InstructionSize
member.summary: The total size from the beginning of the AOB to the end of the instruction containing the relative address.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerAOBRelative.#ctor(PropertyHook.PHook,System.Nullable{System.Byte}[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new relative AOB pointer.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHPointerBase
member.summary: A dynamic pointer starting from a fixed address.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHPointerBase.BaseAddress
member.summary: The fixed address to start from.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerBase.#ctor(PropertyHook.PHook,System.IntPtr,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new base pointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerBase.ResolveSpecific
member.summary: Returns the base address.

member.name: T:PropertyHook.PHPointerChild
member.summary: A dynamic pointer starting from the result of another pointer's resolution.

member.name: P:PropertyHook.PHPointerChild.BasePointer
member.summary: The parent pointer to start from.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerChild.#ctor(PropertyHook.PHook,PropertyHook.PHPointer,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a new child pointer.

member.name: M:PropertyHook.PHPointerChild.ResolveSpecific
member.summary: Returns the final address of the parent pointer.
